quest.name: For Fast, Temporary Relief
journal:
Eshana seems on the verge of panicking.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Use the Ananta healing salve on wounded Resistance fighters.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Forename, our ssscouts, they've been attacked! Left for dead by sssome territorial predator!

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: The messenger who limped into camp sssays they were ssset upon along their patrol route in Virdjala.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: They're in need of immediate attention, and I have no other sssoldiers to sssend. Quickly, take this healing sssalve and find our injured comrades!

dialogue.name: SOLDIERA03067
dialogue.text: Wait, what is that you're smearing on...oh. Oh! The pain is gone!

dialogue.name: SOLDIERA03067
dialogue.text: Thank you! I think...yes, I can make it back on my own now.

dialogue.name: SOLDIERB03067
dialogue.text:
<gasp> Well, that's it then.
I'm done for...

dialogue.name: SOLDIERB03067
dialogue.text: My thanks─you've dragged me back from death's doorstep! I've walked this route a time or two and thought I knew what to expect... I'll be more careful on my way back to the castellum.

dialogue.name: SOLDIERC03067
dialogue.text: I don't know what was in that ointment, but it seems the bleeding's stopped. I'd best report in. My thanks!

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Thank you, Forename─all the ssscouts are accounted for.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Were you perhapsss curious about the sssalve I had you use? It is an old Ananta remedy that numbs the wound and clotsss the blood...for a time.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: As sssuch, these ointmentsss are perfect for emergency treatment out in the field. For long term healing, however, the ressstorative alchemies of your people are far sssuperior.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: The Gatekeepers will, of course, ssseek to employ the bessst combination of both. Thank you again for your ssswift assistance.
